am.mediastre.mediastreamplatformsdkandroid

Class MediastreamLayerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • am.mediastre.mediastreamplatformsdkandroid.MediastreamLayerManager

  • public class MediastreamLayerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the basis for building a layered video player (i.e. a video player with views overlaid on top of it).

    Given a FrameLayout, a Video, and a set of MediastreamLayer objects, the MediastreamLayerManager will create an ExoplayerWrapper for the Video object and create each MediastreamLayer object's view and overlay it on the FrameLayout object.

    Look at MediastreamSimpleVideoPlayer to see MediastreamLayerManager in action.

      Given a container, create the video layers and add them to the container.

      android.app.Activity getActivity()
      Returns the activity which displays the video player created by this MediastreamLayerManager.

      Returns the FrameLayout which contains the views of the MediastreamLayers that this MediastreamLayerManager manages.

      com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.exoplayerextensions.ExoplayerWrapper getExoplayerWrapper()
      Returns the wrapper which ties the video player to ExoPlayer.
      void release()
      When the video player is no longer needed, call this method.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MediastreamLayerManager

        public MediastreamLayerManager(android.app.Activity activity,
                               android.widget.FrameLayout container,
                               com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.exoplayerextensions.Video video,
                               java.util.List<MediastreamLayer> layers,
                               DrmData drmConfig)
        Given a container, create the video layers and add them to the container.
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity which will display the video player.
        container - The frame layout which will contain the views.
        video - the video that will be played by this LayerManager.
        layers - The layers which should be displayed on top of the container.
        drmConfig - Contains the drm settings.
